Assessing AI: Surveying the Spectrum of Approaches to Understanding and Auditing AI Systems

This document assesses various approaches to understanding and auditing AI systems, providing insights into their effectiveness and limitations. It is a report by the Center for Democracy & Technology (CDT) AI Governance Lab, published in January 2025.

Key Concepts:

  • Artificial Intelligence Regulation
  • Technological Informed Solutions
  • Equity in AI Systems
AI Governance Digital Rights Civil Liberties
Technology Intermediate
